contact.title: Contact Us
contact.desc: For more details contact Mr. Khalil abdennabi the commercial director of the company. He is at your disposal at any time to meet your needs.

about.p1: is an international trading company, based in Tunisia.
about.p2: puts at your disposal all his expertise through a young and competent team to perform:
about.li2: An optimal negotiation which tends towards the interest of our customers
about.p3: We offer all types of products in different fields delivered to the destination of your choice.
about.p4: We offer 3 means of delivery Air Freight, Sea Freight and Ground Shipping.

service1.title: The distribution
service1.description1: NOURCOM is a Tunisian company import-export and international representation, we ensure the distribution of different items for the daily use of the consumer.
service1.description2: the satisfaction of our customers is our priority in offering them good products with an excellent value for money, this by treating our business with integrity and efficiency.

service2.title: The negociation
service2.description1: Commercial negotiation is above all a communication process where the partiesin the presence seek agreement through concessions to achieve a common goal:
service2.description2: buy for one of the parties and sell for the other party.

service3.title: Brokerage
service3.description1: Brokerage is a business intermediary activity consisting of bringing together the seller and the buyer.
service3.description2: defines itself among others as a trusted commercial broker and business provider who engages in an activity of intermediary in transactions of sale or purchase of goods or provision of services.
service3.description3: It is our mission to enable the parties concerned to agree on the details of the proposed transaction, which is intended to finalize the rapprochement of the two parties with a view to concluding the necessary contracts.
